Name: Yume
Text: We don't usually get visitors from other cities.

Name: Yume
Text: And when we do, I just get rid of them, this is no place for games.

Name: Yume
Text: I will let it slide this time because I know you're quite famous.

Name: Yume
Text: But don't you dare show your face around here ever again.

Name: Yume
Text: No response huh? Go away before I change my mind.
